info.name: Magento 2
info.author: ShipStream, LLC
info.description:
Sync orders, inventory and tracking information with OpenMage and Magento 1.

Requires the ShipStream Sync extension!

sync_orders.label: Sync Orders
sync_orders.comment: Synchronize orders since the configured "Sync Orders Since" date.

auto_fulfill_status.label: Auto-Fulfill Order Status
auto_fulfill_status.comment: Orders in this status will be automatically imported. Upon successful import the order status is advanced to 'Submitted'. Choosing 'Ready to Ship' will require a user or some custom automation process to advance the order to 'Ready to Ship' status before it can be imported.

auto_fulfill_custom.label: Custom Auto-Fulfill Statuses
auto_fulfill_custom.comment:
This option only has an effect if "Custom (advanced)" is chosen above.
Specify a comma-separated list of order status codes for which orders should be automatically fulfilled.
Example: processing,ready_to_ship

shipping_method_config.label: Shipping Method Translation
shipping_method_config.comment: Translate the Magento Shipping Method (code) or Shipping Description (title) to the indicated shipping method. Rules are evaluated from top to bottom and the first match will "win". The Magento-supported methods for FedEx, UPS and USPS do not require translation if there is a simple one-to-one relationship.

filter_script.label: Order Transform Script
filter_script.comment: JavaScript for modifying order's data before the order creation.

sync_orders_since.label: Sync Orders Since
sync_orders_since.comment: Required only to use the 'Sync Orders' button.
